##HPCC DGEMM Testing

HPC Challenge DGEMM 

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
GflopFile<- read.table("C://Users/Ohad/Documents/RSamples/Rinput.txt", header=TRUE, sep=",", dec=".")
p1<-ggplot(GflopFile, aes(x=factor(N), y=GFLOPS))+geom_boxplot()+geom_jitter()
p1+xlab("Matrix Size")+ylab("GFLOP/S")+
   theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=90))
```
